You have 3 hours to prepare yourself for the monstrosity that is badonkadonk online.

https://discord.gg/AzgMq6pP

Voice shall be used on discord between the hours of 7 and 9pm only and anyone turning up at the pub by mistake will be laughed at.

http://xixs.com/badonkadonk

_list._blog_post_body:
https://twitter.com/wetgenes/status/1400414813143158784 Ironically LitRPG contains much more synergy between game and narrative than most games.

Sure its made up grind that wont work but at least it is related to the narrative :)

So many games consist of just being fed story pellets as you kindly walk down the game corridor.

_list._blog_post_body:
Are you thinking about how to "backronym" all of the dungeon core lore that has coalesced in LitRPG over the last few years and use it in game?

( and I do not just mean a dungeon management game )

Or are you not a game developer?
